src_original: iti śrīmahāvastu-avadāne bahubuddhasūtraṁ samāptaṁ ||  evaṁ mayā śrutamekasmiṁ samaye bhagavāṁ rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate ||
tgt_original: 傳法大師臣施護奉　詔譯 如是我聞：

src_original: atha khalvāyuṣmānmahāmaudgalyāyano kālyameva nivāsayitvā pātracīvaramādāaya rājagṛhaṁ nagaraṁ piṇḍāya prakrami ||  atha khalvāyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya aciraprakrānta- syaitadabhavat ||
tgt_original: 一時佛在王舍城鷲峯山中，時尊者大目乾連食時欲至，著衣持鉢將詣王城，忽作是念：

src_original: atiprāgastāvadetarahiṁ rājagṛhaṁ nagaraṁ piṇḍāya carituṁ |  yaṁ nūnāhaṁ yena śuddhāvāsaṁ devanikāyaṁ tenopasaṁkrameyaṁ ||
tgt_original: 「我於今日，先往色究竟天，問少因緣，却來乞食。

src_original: athāyuṣmānmahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ tadya- (54)  thāpi nāma balavānpuruṣaḥ saṁmiṁjitaṁ bāhuṁ prasāreyetprasāritaṁ ca bāhuṁ saṁmiṁjayet ekakṣaṇena padavītihāreṇa rājagṛhādvaihāyasamamyudgamya śuddhāvāsadevanikāye pratya- sthāt ||
tgt_original: 」於是尊者大目乾連，入三摩地等引，譬如力士屈伸臂頃，到色究竟天。

src_original: adrākṣītśuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrā āyuṣmantaṁ mahāmaudgalyāyanaṁ dūrata evāgacchantaṁ ||  dṛṣṭvā ca punaryenāyuṣmānmahāmaudgalyāyanastenopasaṁkramitvā āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāsi ||  ekānte sthitvā ca te saṁbahulā śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrā āyuṣmantaṁ mahāmaudgalyāyanaṁ gāthābhira- dhyabhāṣasi ||
tgt_original: 既至彼已，與天相見，以種種軟語互相問訊。 時尊者大目乾連乃問天言：

src_original: kalpāna śatasahasraṁ saṁdhāvitvāna bodhiparipākaṁ |  sucirasyanantaratano buddho lokasmiṁ upapanno ||
tgt_original: 「經於何時有佛世尊出現於世，證無上菩提？

src_original: evaṁ durlabhā bodhiryatra hi nāma kalpānāṁ śatasahasreṇa ||
tgt_original: 「滿百千劫，有佛出世，證無上菩提。

src_original: atha khalvāyuṣmānmahāmaudgalyāyanastadyathā balavānpuruṣaḥ saṁmiñjitāṁ bāhāṁ prasārayetprasāritāṁ vā bāhāṁ saṁmiñjayet ettakena kṣaṇavītihāreṇa śuddhāvāsato devanikāyāto antarhitaḥ rājagṛhe nagare pratyasthā ||
tgt_original: 」爾時尊者大目乾連，聞已信受，即入三摩地，譬如力士屈伸臂頃，從色究竟天還到王城，即如常日，次第乞食。

src_original: athāyuṣmā- (55) nmahāmaudgalyāyano rājagṛhe nagare piṇḍāya caritvā paścādbhakto piṇḍapātrapra- tikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṁ pratiśāmayitvā pādau prakṣālayitvā yena bhagavāṁstenopasaṁkra- mitvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte nyaṣīdadekānte niṣṇāśca punaḥ āyuṣmānmahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavantametadavocat  ihāhaṁ bhagavankālyasyaiva nivā- sayitvā pātracīvaramādāya rājagṛhaṁ mahānagaraṁ piṇḍāya prakrami ||  tasya me bhagavan aciraprakrāntasyaitadabhavat ||  atiprāgastāvadetarahi rājagṛhe mahānagare piṇḍāya carituṁ |
tgt_original: 食畢澡漱，收衣鉢已，往詣佛所。 即以頭面禮佛雙足，修敬畢已，在一面坐，合掌瞻仰，而白佛言：

src_original: yaṁ nūnāhaṁ yena śuddhāvāsaṁ devanikāyaṁ tenopasaṁkrameyaṁ |  ciraṁ me devani- kāyaṁ śuddhāvāsaṁ upasaṁkrāntasya ||
tgt_original: 「世尊，我於今日食時欲至，入三摩地往色究竟天，問彼天人：

src_original: ekāntasthitā saṁbahulā te śuddhā- vāsakāyikā devaputrā mama gāthāye adhyabhāṣeran ||

tgt_original: 『滿百千劫，有佛出世，證無上菩提。
